intent_atoms.description: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts must be completed before hardware verification is scheduled.
Schedule macOS and iPadOS hardware verification to confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.
Focus command menus on macOS and iPadOS must announce controls and restore focus targets after hardware verification.
Real-World Assets cannot be used until licensing approvals are obtained.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4..

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verify that focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secure licensing approvals and fixtures for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4, and MPEG‑H to enable regression baselines with real-world media

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Metrics UI in SwiftUI
functional_units.description: Display ParseIssueStore metrics in SwiftUI ribbons once tolerant parsing UI specifications are finalized
